title: lightlord
author: lightlord
content: Hello there,I am looking for a campaign manager for bitvest.io,If you are interested respond below with your resume/qualifications, or by pm.Thanks!

comments.author: Taskford
comments.body: List of recommended managers are listed belowHhampuz https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=881377Royse777 https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=366632julerz12 https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=950662Little Mouse https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=2344286If you also want a quality signature key @jayce is the guy can work with good sets https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=335088This is notable guys that can handle your campaign and for sure you already know that this users can work with the campaign job very well.

comments.author: jcojci
comments.body: Give some of the managers:1. yahoo62278 https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3558462. icopress https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=11375793. CryptopreneurBrainboss ( Signature campaign manager from Bitvest and 777coins previously ). https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=10520914. Little Mouse https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=23442865. joeperry https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=97179

comments.author: Woodie
comments.body: If yahoo62278 is available for the job,  it would be nice to have him back in the campaign management service.yahoo62278 >>>> yahoo62278 Campaign Management services(telegram @yahoo62278)One of the biggest portfolios to his name Experienced and trusted

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: I understand Lightlord wants to make a great presentation on his comeback campaign so I highly recommend these managers these are the managers who can create great campaigns they are all innovative and highly reputable.Royse777  : https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=366632Hhampuz : https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=881377CryptopreneurBrainboss : https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5124215.0

comments.author: freedomgo
comments.body: Lightlord's been around for a while, and it seems like you folks have already suggested all the active campaign managers in the forum. Let's keep this thread tidy and avoid any more unnecessary posts. I'm pretty sure Lightlord mentioned he's on the hunt for a manager, so he'll likely start getting offers from active managers soon.

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Quote from: lightlord on October 16, 2023, 01:22:47 AMIf you are interested respond below with your resume/qualifications, or by pm.Why are those sending links for recommendations not reading that part? OP addressed the post to interested managers to respond by themselves.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: Mpamaegbu on October 16, 2023, 05:41:49 AMQuote from: lightlord on October 16, 2023, 01:22:47 AMIf you are interested respond below with your resume/qualifications, or by pm.Why are those sending links for recommendations not reading that part? OP addressed the post to interested managers to respond by themselves.Its like a call out for managers by their supporters I'm sure they have a Bitcointalk notification on, so by posting their links here they are notified to take action based on their supporters call out, and its another way to show support from the managers that will submit resume and qualifications.Its a practice here.

comments.author: strunberg
comments.body: Quote from: lightlord on October 16, 2023, 01:22:47 AMI am looking for a campaign manager for bitvest.io,If you are interested respond below with your resume/qualifications, or by pm.This is an offer for Managers who are interested in promoting and handling the campaigns that Lightlord has to offer. It's not like Lightlord is asking us to recommend Managers for him.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Quote from: Woodie on October 16, 2023, 04:19:39 AMIf yahoo62278 is available for the job,  it would be nice to have him back in the campaign management service.yahoo62278 >>>> yahoo62278 Campaign Management services(telegram @yahoo62278)One of the biggest portfolios to his name Experienced and trusted I and I am sure a few people have likely already sent a message to Lightlord.Quote from: coin-investor on October 16, 2023, 06:32:45 AMQuote from: Mpamaegbu on October 16, 2023, 05:41:49 AMQuote from: lightlord on October 16, 2023, 01:22:47 AMIf you are interested respond below with your resume/qualifications, or by pm.Why are those sending links for recommendations not reading that part? OP addressed the post to interested managers to respond by themselves.Its like a call out for managers by their supporters I'm sure they have a Bitcointalk notification on, so by posting their links here they are notified to take action based on their supporters call out, and its another way to show support from the managers that will submit resume and qualifications.Its a practice here.If the OP asked for suggestions, then I could agree with your statement. Otherwise, basically it's an easy post for the posters campaign.

comments.author: GeorgeJohn
comments.body: Lightlord you are not supposed to look for manager at least you have to go back with your previous managers because I know quite well that their was not conflict between the previous managers that managed your two campaigns 777coins and bitvest is available I will prefer you using CryptopreneurBrainboss that managed the campaign last before you you go on break... I want to know if you are going to launch a fresh campaign or it will still be 777coins and bitvest?

comments.author: BenCodie
comments.body: Quote from: GeorgeJohn on October 16, 2023, 10:37:54 AMLightlord you are not supposed to look for manager at least you have to go back with your previous managers because I know quite well that their was not conflict between the previous managers that managed your two campaigns 777coins and bitvest is available I will prefer you using CryptopreneurBrainboss that managed the campaign last before you you go on break... I want to know if you are going to launch a fresh campaign or it will still be 777coins and bitvest?It's a free market. Just because he worked with CryptopreneurBrainboss before it does not mean that he has to work with him again. If that business is concluded, that business is concluded. There is no obligation there.Good luck with your new campaign lightlord. I did some reading about you while people were calling for bitvest and 777's threads to be locked, I hope that you are healthy and well, or at least healthier and better than before.

comments.author: lightlord
comments.body: Thanks for all your submissions, I am planning on working with CryptopreneurBrainboss once again, and still holds the funds for the campaign. I'll keep this thread open another 24 hours or so and/or into the announcement of the campaign begins, assuming everything goes according to plan.

comments.author: GeorgeJohn
comments.body: Quote from: BenCodie on October 16, 2023, 08:33:42 PM<...>It's a free market. Just because he worked with CryptopreneurBrainboss before it does not mean that he has to work with him again. If that business is concluded, that business is concluded. There is no obligation there.[/quote]Their one edge that says that the Satan you know is better than the angel you don't know, Hhampuz managed the campaign before CryptopreneurBrainboss, and brainboss managed the campaign less than one year and it has been honest with lightlord starting from the time he managed the campaign.majority of us in higher signature campaign start from 777coins and bitvest because it was one of highest populated hiring participants during the time CryptopreneurBrainboss managed the campaign, so many people can attest to it, if I'm saying a sugar coated phrase or rendering verbal information to qualify brainboss  "NO" I'm saying this because during the day's of my membership, I was one of the participants managed by brainboss and its managerial act was conducive to me. So that is I recommend him to lightlord as his previous manager.Quote from: BenCodie on October 16, 2023, 08:33:42 PMGood luck with your new campaign lightlord. I did some reading about you while people were calling for bitvest and 777's threads to be locked, I hope that you are healthy and well, or at least healthier and better than before.I believe that before lightlord come up of relaunching his campaign he most be healthier than the way he was before, I don't know if what makes him to go on break that takes almost one year is because of illness,  but I'm happy that he later return in bitcointalk to continue his business Quote from: lightlord on October 16, 2023, 08:40:59 PMI'll keep this thread open another 24 hours or so and/or into the announcement of the campaign begins, assuming everything goes according to plan.Lightlord it will be nice for you to launch the campaign and the announcement with your preferable manager, so that everything will be under the custody of the manager so that participants will lookup to the manager in every information that concerns bitcointalk community.

comments.author: uche6215
comments.body: Quote from: CCMS on October 17, 2023, 05:07:38 AMQuote from: the rise on October 16, 2023, 01:25:36 AMPm send ThankyouIt should be PM "Sent" . Which continent do you belong to if I may ask ? CCMS, which continent do you come from? It's like your continent does not use comma when asking question in English.

comments.author: freedomgo
comments.body: You guys are messing this thread with off-topic posts. Please take your grammar corrections battle elsewhere. As for OP, I believe this thread has already served its purpose since the campaign has already been launched. I suggest locking it for now to prevent unnecessary posts.

comments.author: lightlord
comments.body: Quote from: freedomgo on October 17, 2023, 07:16:28 AMYou guys are messing this thread with off-topic posts. Please take your grammar corrections battle elsewhere. As for OP, I believe this thread has already served its purpose since the campaign has already been launched. I suggest locking it for now to prevent unnecessary posts.Locking the thread
